TOP STORIESCops Charged In Slaying Of Elderly Woman
A grand jury indicted three current and former police officers in the shooting death of an elderly Atlanta woman during a
                        drug raid. An autopsy report revealed the 92-year-old woman was shot five or six times in the chest, arms, legs and feet. More...

Byron Keith Perkins was released in January 2006 to undergo tests to see if he could donate a kidney to his teenage son. Instead,
                        he fled to Mexico. Now the convicted bank robber and pot dealer has been caught. His son says "good." More...
